title: Official Lua Documentation
description: The official documentation for Lua programming language.

title: Lua Tutorial - Tutorialspoint
description: Tutorialspoint provides a comprehensive Lua tutorial covering language syntax, features, and practical applications.

title: Lua Tutorial - Tutorial Gateway
description: Tutorial Gateway offers Lua tutorials with clear explanations and examples, suitable for beginners and intermediate learners.

title: Learn Lua - Codecademy
description: Learn the basics of Lua, a general-purpose programming language used for building games, web apps, and developer tools. This course for beginners will teach you the basics of programming with the Lua language while giving you interactive practice building terminal-based programs.

title: Lua Tutorial on Edu
description: Lua tutorial on Edu platform covering various topics of Lua programming.

title: Lua API Documentation - DevDocs.io
description: DevDocs.io offers an aggregated, searchable interface to Lua documentation, including language references and standard library APIs.

title: Learn Lua in Y Minutes
description: Learn X in Y Minutes provides a quick overview of Lua syntax and features, suitable for experienced programmers.
